metadata.title: CVE-2024-5690 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: By monitoring the time certain operations take, an attacker could haveguessed which external protocol handlers were functional on a user'ssystem. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127 and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
